name: Udit Tyagi

full_output.summary: Currently pursuing a B.Tech in Computer Science with a strong academic record and proficiency in Python, Java, and Unix/Linux environments. Experienced in machine learning, data analysis, and software development, having completed internships focused on predictive modeling, data visualization, and Python development. Skilled in problem-solving and developing applications in natural language processing, AI, and data compression, with a keen interest in contributing to scalable and distributed software systems and innovative projects.

projects.name: Credit Card Approval
projects.description: Developed a Logistic Regression model to predict credit card approval outcomes, utilizing supervised learning techniques to analyse and interpret financial data for improved decision-making.

projects.name: Connect 4 game
projects.description: Python Connect Four game in Python is a two-player strategy game where players take turns dropping coloured discs into a grid, aiming to align four in a row. The project involves building the game logic, user interface, and ensuring smooth gameplay through Python programming.

experiences.description: Worked on applying machine learning techniques to real-world problems, developing predictive models, and optimizing data processing pipelines to derive actionable insights and improve business outcomes.
Worked on a data analytics internship, utilizing SQL for data querying and Power BI for creating interactive dashboards and visualizations to support data-driven decision-making.

Gained hands-on experience in data analysis, machine learning, and predictive modeling by working closely with data scientists on real-world projects. Involved in data cleaning, analysis, and visualization, while enhancing skills and understanding of data science principles.

Acquired hands-on Python development experience through creating projects like a digital clock, Tic-Tac-Toe, Snake, and Connect 4 games. Developed skills in problem-solving, game development, and Python proficiency.
